::GoldenEye:;

She smiled as only an eagle can. "Yes, Friends forever. Now you want 
to go to a Maximal base? I can take you one if you want."
She smiled but her spark sank.  She knew that once she had left Tails 
at a Maximal base, she may never see her friend again. 

She spread her wings and picked up Tails. "Hang on. And don't look 
down."  She flew over the valley and past the Pred base.  She kept 
going until she came to the Cybertron Fire.

She set Tails down infront of the ship. "Now walk up to the door and 
tell them that you want to join them. They will show you all you need 
to know." She wrapped her wings around Tails. "You take care of 
yourself. I'll stop by this way real soon."  She looked at her friend 
for one last time and flew off.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Danielle Laing <sky_duv@y...> wrote:
> Tails glanced at Goldeneye.
> "Gold...would you take me to the Maximal base? And
> please don't think I'm being ungrateful! Because I
> want to thank you for saving my life numerous times
> today! And for being my first friend here. Anyway, we
> can see each other every day, right? Because friends
> always like to be together..."
> The squirrel smiled at the eagle amiably.
>
